sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>slide</radical> to get off this <radical>jet</radical> is a beautiful, brilliant <kanji>vermilion</kanji> color.
meaningInfo: Vermilion is like an orange red, which is perfect for visibility purposes.
readingMnemonic: You jump onto the <kanji>vermilion</kanji> slide. It's actually more of a steep <reading>chu</reading>te (<ja>しゅ</ja>). And... oh... urp... it's making you sick.
readingInfo: The vermilion chute spits you out and you spit out your lunch. And it looks vermilion. Uh oh. Hospital. Please.
